page.title: 04OTHER CHRISTIAN GROUPS
page.content: The{Methodist}membership is about 30 and the average weekly attendance is about 25. There is a Sunday School for those under 12\ and a creche. There is a youth club in the village hall at the same time as the service, whose members can join the adults for a family service. There are weekly Bible study classes and a discussion fellowship held in member's homes. They also meet for other social occasions. {St.Margarets Catholic Church}has an average attendance of 100. The priest comes from Ongar on Sundays and Holy Days. The majority of Catholic children attend St. Helen's Primary School in Brentwood. There is a social gathering for parishioners in St. Margaret's Hall every Sunday after the Mass at 9:45am. { }
